item.title: 3 Earnings Reports Give a Snapshot of Consumer Sentiment
item.description: Strong earnings from McDonald's, Shopify, and DoorDash suggest consumer resilience, but a closer look signals caution amid inflation and economic unce...

item.title: Amazon’s Bears Have Raised the White Flag—Get Excited
item.description: Amazon’s post-earnings dip is already fading, and with shares continuing to remain above key support at $220, the bears may be done.

item.title: Tempus AI’s Strong Q2 Fuels Growth Story—More Upside Ahead?
item.description: Tempus AI fired on all cylinders in Q2, and Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock. What is the near and long-term outlook for this name, up 89% in 2025?

item.title: CAVA’s Honeymoon Ends With a 16% Stock Drop
item.description: CAVA stock fell 16% after mixed Q2 results and lowered sales guidance, but its long-term expansion plan may present a buy-the-dip opportunity

item.title: Rocket Lab Scores Analyst Upgrades, Finalizes Geost Takeover
item.description: Analysts are turning even more bullish on RKLB, with multiple firms sharply raising price targets, pushing the consensus from $30.40 a month ago to $4...
